item.title: Blyss - Beauty Within
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

To hell with it

To Frell & Archer: Knock that shit off right now(to the rest of you, refer to STH’s first first post on the right way to criticize, and Frell’s frist post on how to be an asshole)
To eclipse: Don’t act like a whiny little bitch because you didn’t get nice comments. and then create a nice little twisted scenario for when archer abuses his power so you can go baaaaaaw to another forum about it I can’t really say anything else other than you should grow up.

item.title: Blyss - Beauty Within
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“eclipse245, post:26, topic:317138”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=413678.msg3048193#msg3048193 date=1259912094]

So all CGI guys, who make landscape for movies. Have no skill. Because all they use are generators. Great statement. Your age is predictable too.

You shut up Archer…You think you’re authoritative because you’re a mod? You think I’ll consider it a loss if you mute me? Nope.
[/quote]What the fuck is with you attacking people on this thread, it makes you look like an ignorant little kid.

I’m attacking? They come on my thread, and start saying I suck because I generated terrain. WHAT THE FUCK DO THEY KNOW?

The difference being, you’re an idiot with no skill, and they’re experienced 3d artists.

SHUT THE FUCK UP! I hope you get hit by a truck[/quote]Please quote where people in this topic have directly said you suck (other than unhandled after you raged), they simply gave their opinions on what you ‘created’ and you’re too much of a little girl to take it and raged over nothing

Read full topic

item.title: Blyss - Beauty Within
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“eclipse245, post:33, topic:317138”][quote author=Frell link=topic=413678.msg3048985#msg3048985 date=1259973650]

I really don’t give a shit if I get muted. But word will spread this forum sucks ass. Because it’s packed with a bunch of cocky pricks.

So you’d prefer a forum where you post stuff that takes little effort and they worship you?
[/quote]

Better than having little geeky kids like you thinking they’re masters.[/quote]

We don’t think we’re masters. But on a scale of 1 - 10 your skill involved in that is like 2.4

And don’t act like we don’t know shit. I get paid for the shit I do, and this is the industry I work in.

Read full topic

item.title: Blyss - Beauty Within
item.dc:creator: @fezz fezz
item.description:
@fezz wrote:

[quote=“eclipse245, post:4, topic:317138”]Okay…I’ve spent the past year, trying to learn how to make proper terrains, and how to get nice atmospheres. You think it’s easy playing with nodes and numbers. Sure it is. If you want your stuff to look like shit…

So yea, this is my work. I made it. I put my time into it. It’s mine. And it’s nice.[/quote][quote=“eclipse245, post:17, topic:317138”]I didn’t generate it…I had to texture it. And I had to mess with atmosphere settings.[/quote][quote=“eclipse245, post:11, topic:317138”]I never said models are easy. Neither is making this terrain. I want to see you make a terrain like this. Honestly. Since you think it’s so easy.

loosen up your ass.

Are you suggesting me to turn gay and or be raped?

How old are you? If you say you’re over 18…then that’s just sad…[/quote]

[quote=“eclipse245, post:33, topic:317138”][quote author=Frell link=topic=413678.msg3048985#msg3048985 date=1259973650]

I really don’t give a shit if I get muted. But word will spread this forum sucks ass. Because it’s packed with a bunch of cocky pricks.

So you’d prefer a forum where you post stuff that takes little effort and they worship you?
[/quote]

Better than having little geeky kids like you thinking they’re masters.[/quote]

whistles

I hate to be obvious but don’t you think the same of yourself too? or have you changed your mind about what you think about yourself

Read full topic

item.description:

jesus, this thread O_O it’s prettay fiesty.

anyway, I’m really not into this stuff, but you should try creating well known landscape, like the grand canyon :o I’m not familiar at all with Vue so I’m not sure if you could actually do that or not. But yeah attempting to recreate well known landscapes would be sweet
